features: 【Compatible with PurSteam Steam Mop 10-in-1】The 6 Pack Steam Mop Cleaner 10-in-1/ThermaPro 211 Steam Mop Cleaner is meticulously crafted to seamlessly fit and attach to the PurSteam Steam Mop. The robust magic label ensures a secure and dependable attachment, providing you with peace of mind during your cleaning sessions.

【6 Pack Orange Super Cleaning Steam Mop Pad】The enhanced steam mop pad features a cutting-edge fabric that excels in tackling the most stubborn and adhesive stains on your home's floors. Designed to complement our regular mop pads, it equips you with the tools necessary to meet all your daily cleaning requirements and enjoy an elevated level of cleanliness in your living space.

【Recyclable & Easy to Wash and Dry】Our 6 Pack of PurSteam mop steam replacement pads are crafted with durability in mind. They retain their original size and shape even after repeated washing and extensive use, ensuring longevity. Cleaning these steam pads is a breeze, allowing for increased convenience and usability, thus maximizing their lifespan.

【Perfect Cleaning Kit Partner】With 6 upgraded ultra cleaning pads, this 6 Pack steam mops serves as the ideal partner for your cleaning endeavors. Offering excellent coverage for long-term and frequent use at home, it guarantees remarkable performance that lasts 9-12 months. Embrace this highly cost-effective choice that caters to all your cleaning needs.

【Considerate After-sales Support】Should there be any queries regarding the replacement pads for your steam mop, feel free to reach out to us at any time. We are committed to delivering products of the highest quality and ensure efficient customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well like the original
reviews.reviewText: Works well like the original. It's always good to have some extras of these just in case. There's not much to say about the quality of these other than they're similar to the original. The ones I had were getting really gross and starting to smell musty. Thankfully these works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work like the original
reviews.reviewText: These pads work like the original that came with the steamer. They are a little smaller than the original, you can see the comparison in the second picture and the 3rd picture is the original.Even though it is slightly smaller, it still gets the job done. The velcro keeps it on the mop perfectly. So many pads come in this package, it is a great deal for the price. I won't have to buy any replacements for a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very absorbent and soft
reviews.reviewText: My apartment still has renovation dust in it. I live in a newly remodeled modern apartment with luxury vinyl planks. As you can see, dust continues to settle on my floors as we move things in and out. I ordered this large pack of replacement steam mop pads so that I could toss the ones that get extremely dirty. Needless to say, these work great! They completely removed the dust from the floor and they leave my floors streak-free, and shiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bundle of 4 steamer cleaning pads are great backups for the two pads which came with my steamer. I can clean a larger area, i.e. more rooms, by not having to stop to wash the two pads. Now, I can do several rooms using the original two pads and 2 of these, depending on my needs. These pads don't fit exactly with my steamer which has a square head so the pads protrude a little on the front and back. However, they attach snuggly and don't shift while in use. The scrubbing pad works well for more stubborn areas such as the kitchen. The pads are well made and I'm expecting a long life out of them. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the scrubber pads
reviews.reviewText: I have a ton of the soft mop pads and was looking for something more substantial to clean my tile. These did the trick. Package came with both the soft, Terry-like versions and the "scrubber". Worked very well, adhered to the velcro attachments on the bottom of my mop and stayed put when in use. The size is a tad off - or maybe it's the shape, either way - they fit fine and worked like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement pads
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as additions to the 2 pads that came with the mop. They fit great, don't leave little bits of material on the floor, and wash up nice. I should be able to use these again and again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These fit my steam mop perfectly and I like the fact that they give you two different types. Reccomended, it's definitely a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my steam mop.
reviews.reviewText: These replacement pads for my steam mop are great. They are almost identical to the ones that came with it. To have a few extra is so nice. The striped ones are soft and work nicely. The orange ones are a little more rough and work great to scrub harder problem areas. You just toss them in the wash to clean them. I love the sustainability.
